Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.activity

This package contains classes which define the various BPEL activities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeAlarmParentDef Defs that can parent an onAlarm construct should implement this interface.
IAeEventContainerDef Interface for <eventHandlers>.
IAeExtensionActivityDef Marker interface for identifying AE provided extension activities.
IAeLoopActivityDef A tagging interface to mark an activity (like a "while") as being a loop container that is capable of having a nested "continue" or "break" activity.
IAeMessageContainerDef Interface for <pick>.
IAeMessageDataConsumerDef interface for wsio activity defs that consume message data
IAeMessageDataProducerDef interface for the wsio activity defs that produce message data
IAePartnerLinkActivityDef Provides interface for defs that model a partner link operation like a receive, onMessage, invoke, and reply.
IAeReceiveActivityDef This method exposes some useful methods for determining if the receive (or onMessage) is a one-way or request-response.
IAeTimedDef Interface contains the getter methods for getting the duration or deadline for a timed event like a wait or an alarm.
 

Class Summary
AeAbstractExtensionActivityDef Base class for defs that model the contents of an extension activity.
AeActivityAssignDef Definition for bpel assign activity.
AeActivityBreakDef Definition object for a continue activity.
AeActivityCompensateDef Definition for bpel compensate activity.
AeActivityCompensateScopeDef Definition for the 'compensateScope' activity.
AeActivityContinueDef Definition object for a continue activity.
AeActivityEmptyDef Reads bpel empty activity definition.
AeActivityExitDef Definition for bpel exit activity.
AeActivityFlowDef Definition for bpel flow activity.
AeActivityForEachDef Definition object for the "forEach" activity.
AeActivityIfDef Definition for bpel if/switch activity.
AeActivityInvokeDef Definition for bpel invoke activity.
AeActivityOpaqueDef Reads abstract bpel process's opaque activity definition.
AeActivityPickDef Definition for bpel pick activity.
AeActivityReceiveDef Definition for bpel receive activity.
AeActivityRepeatUntilDef Models the 'repeateUntil' bpel construct introduced in WS-BPEL 2.0.
AeActivityReplyDef Definition for bpel reply activity.
AeActivityRethrowDef Models the 'rethrow' bpel construct that was introduced in WS-BPEL 2.0.
AeActivityScopeDef Definition for bpel scope activity.
AeActivitySequenceDef Definition for bpel sequence activity.
AeActivitySuspendDef Suspend activity suspends the process and passes the optional variable to the notification layer.
AeActivityThrowDef Definition for bpel throw activity.
AeActivityValidateDef Models the validate activity introduced in WS-BPEL 2.0 (in section 8.1 of the spec).
AeActivityWaitDef Definition for bpel wait activity.
AeActivityWhileDef Definition bpel while activity.
AeNotUnderstoodExtensionActivityDef When the I/O layer reads an extensionActivity, the child must be an Activity.
AeUnderstoodExtensionActivityDef Def used to model the contents of an extension activity that is understood by the engine.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.activity Description

This package contains classes which define the various BPEL activities.
